body_html:
Warning: As this doesn't appear to be a bug with Tensorflow, the devs may ask for this to be moved to Stack Overflow.

You'll want to use the android libraries to then use the JAVA API.
Android Libraries: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/android
Java API Info: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/java/README.md

You can also see the demo Android Application here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android

body:
_Warning: As this doesn't appear to be a bug with Tensorflow, the devs may ask for this to be moved to Stack Overflow._

You'll want to use the android libraries to then use the JAVA API.
Android Libraries: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/android
Java API Info: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/java/README.md

You can also see the demo Android Application here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android
